paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: ATTRv with various clinical presentations including cardiac and neurologic involvement

individual_records.phenotype_details: symptomatic with cardiac and neurologic involvement
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The median age of symptomatic patients at the time of clinical diagnosis was 65 years.

individual_records.phenotype_details: asymptomatic carrier diagnosed during family screening
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Their median age was 29 years at the time of genetic testing.

functional_data.summary: No specific functional data provided in the paper.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study identified multiple pathogenic mutations in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: The two most common mutations were ATTRHis88Arg (nine families) and ATTRIle107Val (8 families).
Twelve individuals without clinical signs of HF or polyneuropathy were considered asymptomatic carriers.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
